response.name: Barbell Squat
response.instructions: 1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding the barbell on your upper back. 2. Lower hips back and down, keeping chest up. 3. Push through heels to return to standing. Repeat for 3-4 sets of 8-12 reps.

response.name: Lunges
response.instructions: 1. Stand tall, step forward with one leg, lowering hips until both knees are at 90-degree angles. 2. Push through the front heel to return. Alternate legs or keep same leg for reps. Aim for 3 sets of 10-15 per leg.

response.name: Leg Press Machine
response.instructions: 1. Sit on the machine, place feet shoulder-width on the platform. 2. Push the platform away using legs, extending knees fully. 3. Slowly return to starting position. Perform 4 sets of 10-12 reps.
